channel.title: Comments on: KristinaNaude.com: From Comp To Code In 12 Hours

item.title: By: Russell Heimlich
item.dc:creator: Russell Heimlich
item.description:
Lots of hours of finnicky tweaking. Actually you could calculate a proper vertical rhythm to make everything sit on the lines using this http://topfunky.com/baseline-rhythm-calculator/
Or read this article from 2006 http://24ways.org/2006/compose-to-a-vertical-rhythm
item.content:encoded:
Lots of hours of finnicky tweaking. Actually you could calculate a proper vertical rhythm to make everything sit on the lines using this http://topfunky.com/baseline-rhythm-calculator/

Or read this article from 2006 http://24ways.org/2006/compose.....cal-rhythm

item.title: By: Brian Bailey
item.dc:creator: Brian Bailey
item.description: Nice site! What would it take to get the text on her resume to line up with the lines on the paper?
item.content:encoded: Nice site! What would it take to get the text on her resume to line up with the lines on the paper?

item.title: By: Russell Heimlich
item.dc:creator: Russell Heimlich
item.description: No prob. Let me know what you need help. I've got a pretty good grasp on jQuery.
item.content:encoded: No prob. Let me know what you need help. I’ve got a pretty good grasp on jQuery.

item.title: By: ericspaceman
item.dc:creator: ericspaceman
item.description: Right spot now :), I'm going to need you to holla at me about jquery, div tags and some page design elements. When I get some time be prepared :P
